rrdworld.name: Munin
rrdworld.author: Ingvar Hagelund, Kjetil T. Homme, Patrick Domack, Mike Discenza, Alexandre Dupouy, Nicolai Langfeldt, Mike Fedyk
rrdworld.description: Munin is a tool for collecting performance data and displaying it in a web interface. It has a master/node architecture. The master collects data from the nodes at regular intervals, storing the data in RRD, and updates the graphs. One of the main goals has been ease of creating plugins.
